reviewText:
This a Great Ploit, i Just Saw it Today on DVD
(Ghostwriter Season One)
Was Wondering Though Does The Tape have the Ending On the last Epsodie Of
This Ploit where Lenny (Blaze Berdhal) Singing Friends are forever during the Credits?
Because Unfortionally On The DVD They Deleted that Part
They also Deleted "Your Not my friend" Song , i think it was at the ending creits of the 8th epsodie !!
so anybody can tell me if that extra song(s) are on this tape i surerly will buy it just for it/them :)
